text: The men's team sprint took place on 23 February 2007. Team sprint qualifying at 16:20 CET and finals at 17:20 CET. The defending world champions were Norway's Tore Ruud Hofstad and Tor Arne Hetland. == Results == Q – Qualified for final round due to placing in heat q – Qualified for final round due to times PF – Placing decided by Photo finish === Semifinals === ;Semifinal 1 {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" !
